articles.title: 2025 NFL combine: What We Learned during Friday's activities in Indianapolis - NFL.com
articles.description: How did the 2025 NFL Draft's top quarterbacks respond to critiques? Which prospect is planning to break the 40-yard dash record? See the answer to those questions and more of What We Learned on Friday at the NFL Scouting Combine.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: More than 20 people missing in India’s Uttarakhand after avalanche - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Authorities say at least 25 people remain trapped after avalanche hits a work camp, burying dozens under the snow.
articles.content:
At least 25 people are missing after an avalanche struck the Indian Himalayan state of Uttarakhand, authorities say.
Blizzard-like conditions caused the avalanche on Friday near a highway in the sta… [+2596 chars]

articles.title: India and EU agree to conclude a long-pending free trade agreement by the end of this year - The Associated Press
articles.description: India and the European Union have agreed to finalize a long-pending free trade agreement this year and boost cooperation in trade, technology, connectivity and defense. Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi said after meeting with European Commission President …
